definition: (physiology) the responsive adjustment of a sense organ (as the eye) to varying conditions (as of light)
details:
noun
- (physiology) the responsive adjustment of a sense organ (as the eye) to varying conditions (as of light)
- a written work (as a novel) that has been recast in a new form
= example: a written work (as a novel) that has been recast in a new form
- the process of changing or adjusting to something
= example: the process of changing or adjusting to something
= synonyms: adjustment, adaption
